item.title: Tank stats
item.description: The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows tanks with the highest average of players’ WR in the tank compared to the players’ WR at the same tier (in all tanks).

item.title: Tier X Tanks
item.description: The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows the tanks the players win the most compared to their average WR at the tier. The measure is called Relative WR and it is a measure of the performance/strength of the tank.

item.title: Tier X stats
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier X during update 6.10. Battles per Player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.10. On average, players played 160 battles.

item.title: Update 6.10
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought during 6.10. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not cumululative/total/lifetime stats unless otherwise mentioned. In total, there were 196650865 battles recorded by 402435 players.

item.title: Tier IX stats
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier IX during update 6.10. Battles per Player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.10. On average, players played 125 battles.

item.title: Stats by tier
item.description: This page shows player statistics per tier played during update 6.10. Tank statistics per tier can be found here. Average Tier WR vs. Average Tier This graph shows player WR vs.

item.title: Career stats
item.description: This page shows statistics of players’ battles fought during their Blitz “career” until the end of update 6.10. Battles per Player Number of total battles per player in the end of the update 6.

item.title: Stats by Region
item.description: This page shows statistics per Blitz servers/regions (EU, NA, ASIA, Russia) during update 6.10. Statistics for the Chinese server are not available via WG API. Number of players This graphs shows players by region in the dataset who have played at least one game.
